summary: This is an email from Amazon's Law Enforcement Response Team to an Assistant U.S. Attorney (AUSA), transmitting Amazon's response to a law enforcement request related to the Epstein case. The email notes that Amazon has redacted titles of expressive materials and reserves objections to the request as voluminous and burdensome.

persons.name: AUSA
persons.context: The intended recipient of the email from Amazon's Law Enforcement Response Team regarding a law enforcement request.

persons.name: Manager, Law Enforcement Response Team
persons.context: The sender of the email from Amazon.com, Inc., transmitting Amazon's response to a law enforcement request.

events.title: Amazon's Response to Law Enforcement Request
events.description: Amazon's Law Enforcement Response Team sends a response to an AUSA regarding a law enforcement request, noting redactions of expressive material titles and objections to the request's volume and burden.

keyFacts: Amazon responded to a law enforcement request related to the Epstein case on July 2, 2020.
Amazon redacted the titles of expressive materials in its response for privacy and legal reasons.
Amazon objected to the request as unusually voluminous and unduly burdensome.
The communication was sent from Amazon's Law Enforcement Response Team to an Assistant U.S. Attorney.
